title: Pretty good for the price
text: The room was clean and nice, but it was a little bit noisy. It's not very big, but it's nice if just sleep there. The guys at the reception were helpful. The breakfast was a dissapointment. They said there's going to be muffins and fruits and everything, but instead there were only toasts and jam. It was kind of boring after 5 mornings... The location is pretty good. The cable car line is close to it and u can also walk to attractions. There is a bus stop just in front of the hotel.But it's right on the edge of the good area.If u turn to the right from the hotel it kind of gets creepy and u just simply don't wan't to walk further.
